Name: Lomé
Description: Lomé is the capital and largest city of Togo.

Name: Badou
Description: Badou is a town nestled in the Akposso mountains, situated in the West Plateau Region about nine hours from the capital of Lome. Badou is located in the district of Wawa, and is the district capital.  The area is known for being rich agriculturally and many people are farmers.

Name: Kara
Description: Kara is a city in Togo.

Name: Kpalime
Description: Kpalime (also spelled Kpalimé) is in Central Togo.
